strapiPost.title: Store Bringing 'Best Furniture Shopping Experience' To NWA
strapiPost.content:
A national furniture retailer, based in Oklahoma, has claimed it is bringing to Rogers the best furniture shopping experience in Arkansas.

  • Filling spaces: Mathis Brothers Furniture recently purchased 53.3 acres in the Pleasant Crossing development along Dixieland Road. The property will include 250k SF of retail space and 250k SF of warehouse space. The project is going to create 300 jobs and is scheduled to be completed by Q1 2024. 
  • Selections: Amidst a rapidly growing area, new projects and new jobs are a good sign for the economy. And as more houses are built, more shopping options for furniture will be a fine addition. Weâ€™ll just have to see if Mathis Brothers really is the best shopping experience of them all.
